subject: Football
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: Bill Sheridan, the Giants’ defensive coordinator, kept the 4-3 alignment but said the linemen and linebackers would charge to stop runs and passes and not be responsible for covering receivers.
snippet: Bill Sheridan, the Giants’ defensive coordinator, kept the 4-3 alignment but said the linemen and linebackers would charge to stop runs and passes and not be responsible for covering receivers.
